Detailed Description

Base class for pre- and userdefined tones, melodies and other sound resources. Every sound has a unique ID. The IDs 0 to 999 are reserved for APOXI:
  • 0 ... IMelody
  • 1 ... PreparedSound
  • 2 ... SmafSound
  • 3 ... MidiSound
